Reviews.Content: The good and the bad       The comfy bed
Reviews.Author: angelajl

Reviews.Content: This place is a pit - awful We arrived after confirming availability of a villa via email to learn all villas were sold out and the only rooms left were two standard ones. It was not until we checked into the two rooms that we discovered the rooms were filthy. There was black mold in the bathroom. The shower door didn't close. There were big cobwebs in the corners. The entire place is right next to a huge rice field, so there are tons of mosquitoes everywhere. The beds don't have mosquito nets. The person at the front desk immediately tried to sell us a dolphin tour right after we arrived. There is a beach at the end of the long finger of land the hotel sits on, but there are many touts and we quickly learned that kept most hotel guests off the beach. After just 50 minutes in this dive of a hotel, we packed up all our stuff and told the hotel front desk we weren't staying. THEY INSISTED ON CHARGING US 1/2 PRICE FOR EACH ROOM even though we had been there less than an hour. This place is awful. We stayed for a month in Bali, and didn't ever ever encounter anything nearly as bad as this place.
Reviews.Author: HawaiiSun07

Reviews.Content: Good Staff is friendlyfood is good but too internationalsmall swinning pool beach is small with black sandtypical rooms holidays for rest (quiet)
Reviews.Author: fab78

Reviews.Content: Our time at Aneka Lovina We arrived at Aneka Lovina by car from Ubud with no reservation and asked if any rooms were available. We were shown a very nice villa unit and negotiated the price.(approx 30% of the published rate) We stayed 5 or 6 nights and where happy with the resort.The room was quite large, the bed was very comfortable and the a/c and the fridge worked well.The pool and gardens were very beautiful and inviting.The staff were very pleasant (as most balinese are)The locals who sell watches,massage,sarongs etc on the beach are not to pushyand if you take the time to have a chat with them they are all really nice people.There are a few minor negatives however-The bathrooms are a little dated--but are very clean.We were woken very early (5am) by the other guests going on the dolphin tour.My wife contracted a upset stomach after eating at the restoraunt.However we did enjoy our stay and would go back again
Reviews.Author: gordy2539
